Title: A Christmas Story Live!
Writer: Jean Shepherd (based on the screenplay by), Leigh Brown (based on the screenplay by), Bob Clark (based on the screenplay by), Jean Shepherd (based on the novel "In God We Trust,  All Others Pay Cash" by), Joseph Robinette (based on the stage musican "A Christmas Story": book by), Benj Pasek (based on the stage musican "A Christmas Story": music and lyrics by), Justin Paul (based on the stage musican "A Christmas Story": music and lyrics by), Robert Cary (teleplay by), Jonathan Tolins (teleplay by)
Actors: Maya Rudolph, Chris Diamantopoulos, Ana Gasteyer, Tyler Wladis
Plot: A live broadcast of the Broadway hit "A Christmas Story: The Musical" in which Ralphie wishes for nothing more than a Red Ryder BB Gun for Christmas.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 nominations.
